name: Seven Minutes in the Art World
name_original: Seven Minutes in the Art World
description:
Gameplay & Game test video :

Inspired by Grayson Perry's Playing to the Gallery, Seven Minutes in the Art World is not so much a love letter as a racy text to the expensive mess that is the contemporary art world. Incarnated as Grayson on a bike, you will whizz through the hectic pixel art fair - and maybe come out a more interesting person...
